# init(checkpoint:)

**Initializer**

Creates an action classifier from a training session checkpoint.

## Declaration

```swift
init(checkpoint: MLCheckpoint) throws
```

## Parameters

- **checkpoint**: A checkpoint from an action classifier training session.
